price: (Muusaanis) “Lakkisaa; isinummaan darbaa!” jedhe, yoggus haadoowwan isaaniifi uleewwann isaaniis falfala isaanii irraa kan ka'e waan fiigdu (bofa) itti fakkeeffama.
arabic: قَالَ بَلۡ أَلۡقُواْۖ فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمۡ وَعِصِيُّهُمۡ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيۡهِ مِن سِحۡرِهِمۡ أَنَّهَا تَسۡعَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal alqū fa-idhā ḥibāluhum waʿiṣiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilayhi min siḥ'rihim annahā tasʿā
